title.rendered: Slim Down Your B2B Marketing Services, Bulk Up Your Revenue

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1516226069548{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/single-resource-page-bg-colorol-1902×496.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1512514857204{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Slim Down Your B2B Marketing Services, Bulk Up Your Revenue

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1512757523212{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #3a3042 !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

On Demand Webinar
Air Date: July 27, 2017
Duration: 1 hour

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1507570167359{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1507577013722{margin-top: -24% !important;margin-bottom: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156813″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1508728212924{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156775″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1508728208547{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

How to repackage your service offerings to enhance your B2B marketing strategy

Are you the Cheesecake Factory of agencies?

When you offer a lengthy menu of services, chances are you won’t get the maximum value out of each client relationship, and you’ll spread your agency too thin.

In this webinar, agency expert David Baker covered:

  • Ways to slim down and repackage your service offerings
  • How to identify and target the right clients for your agency
  • Whether to publish your pricing online – and how to do it

[/vc_column_text]

Your Hosts:

David C. Baker

Principal, ReCourses, Inc.

David is an author, speaker, and advisor to entrepreneurial experts. His work has been featured in the WSJ, Fast Company, USA Today, Inc. Magazine, Forbes, MarketingProfs, and BusinessWeek.

Michelle Moore

Director of External Relations, SharpSpring

As SharpSpring's Spokeswoman, Michelle is responsible for building brand awareness to ensure businesses are aware of SharpSpring’s marketing automation platform and the agency-focused model. She has more than 20 years of marketing and public relations experience, including developing and implementing integrated marketing campaigns for small businesses and large corporations.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1507570006488{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Watch It Now

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
